IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE MEMBERS WITH MEDICAL, DISABILITY AND LIFE INSURANCE BENEFITS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE MEMBERS WITH MEDICAL, DISABILITY AND LIFE INSURANCE BENEFITS.
IRS990.Desc: THE FUND PROVIDED MEDICAL, VISION, DENTAL, GROUP LIFE, AND DISABILITY BENEFITS TO ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: RIGHT TO USE ASSET - OPERATING LEASE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM IS EMAILED TO ALL TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE POLICY IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY AT THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES MEETING AND ANY CONFLICTS MUST BE DISCLOSED, DISCUSSED AND RESOLVED

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PAGE 6, PART VI, LINE 15A: THE FUND ADMINISTRATOR WORKS UNDER A MANAGERIAL EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT. THE BOARD APPOINTS A COMMITTEE THAT PERFORMS A SALARY COMPARISON, REVIEWS THE PERFORMANCE AND EXPECTATIONS OF THE BOARD AND FUND ADMINISTRATOR, AND MAKES RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE BOARD FOR APPROVAL. FORM 990 PAGE 6 PART VI, LINE 15B: UNION TRUSTEES ARE COMPENSATED FOR LOST TIME FOR ATTENDING BOARD OF TRUSTEE MEETINGS. THE TRUSTEE IS COMPENSATED AT A RATE EQUAL TO WHAT THE TRUSTEE'S COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS WOULD BE HAD HE WORKED FOR HIS EMPLOYER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO PARTICIPANTS UPON REQUEST.
